channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Home cookin': Diners skipping restaurants and making more meals at home as inflation trend inverts
item.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Eating in is in and eating out is out.That’s the message that inflation-squeezed consumers have been sending to fast-food companies and other restaurants.

item.title: Biden wants to make active shooter drills in schools less traumatic for students
item.description: President Joe Biden is expected to sign an executive order on Thursday that aims to help schools make active shooter drills less traumatic for students yet still effective.

item.title: NASA, Boeing and Coast Guard representatives to testify about implosion of Titan submersible
item.description: Representatives for NASA, Boeing Co. and the U.S. Coast Guard are slated to testify in front of investigators Thursday about the experimental submersible that imploded en route to the wreckage of the Titanic.
